scenario: SAP ERP failover to DR site

deficienciesNoted: Minor signage gaps noted in stairwell B
correctiveActionPlan: Update evacuation signage in stairwell B

deficienciesNoted: None - recovery completed well within target
Recovery took 8 hours vs 4 hour target. Manual fallback procedures were outdated and staff unfamiliar with process.
correctiveActionPlan: Update manual fallback procedures and conduct staff training

scenario: Full DR test - all critical systems
deficienciesNoted: Exercise cancelled due to George Sr court date conflict. No alternative date scheduled. Full-scale DR capability remains untested for 2024.
correctiveActionPlan: Reschedule full-scale DR exercise within 30 days

deficienciesNoted: No BCP exists for banana stand operations. Tabletop revealed no one knows recovery procedures. Buster noted his hook hand is not compatible with the cash register.
correctiveActionPlan: Develop BCP for banana stand operations and procure accessible equipment
